Question: 1897–1997 (bulk 1949–1969), includes a variety of printed materials and photographs about this person and his projects.
Hints: Local gossips noticed this person's flirtations, and he developed a reputation in Oak Park as a man-about-town.
In 1966, the United States Postal Service honored this person with a Prominent Americans series 2¢ postage stamp.
This person was married three times and fathered seven children, four sons and three daughters.
